```{r}
#USEFUL LINK(S): http://www.sthda.com/english/articles/40-regression-analysis/165-linear-regression-essentials-in-r/ 
library(broom)
#creating linear model to predict price by bed,bath,acre_lot&house_size
linear_model_fit <- lm(price~bed+bath+acre_lot+house_size, data = TRAINING_DATA)
#quick summary of our model
summary(linear_model_fit)
#using tidy() to create a tibble of coefficients to use for neural network weights later
weights_table <- tidy(linear_model_fit)

```
